description:
KAIR is a non-profit organization seeking to serve those Middle Keys individuals and families in crisis. Services provided by KAIR include: 

* Food - Pre-made meals for the homeless and transients and bags of groceries are distributed for those are able to cook. Thanksgiving and Christmas Feast Baskets available. 
* Medical and Dental - Assistance with prescriptions, co-pays to the clinic, and for medical appointments
* Optical - Assistance with prescription glasses
* Rent - Assistance to make a security deposit or a grant towards rent
* Utilities - Water, electric, basic phone line 
* Transportation - Gas voucher, greyhound, local bus fare
* ID Documents - Birth certificates, ID, work documents
* School Supplies - Provides back-to-school backpacks, school supplies
* Wish List Program - In-Kind donations of household goods, furniture, cars, clothing, baby items, etc., are delivered to KAIR on a daily basis. Items are distributed to Keys residents for free.
* "Live Aboards" Assistance - Provides sanitation devices and toilet hosing kits to maintain live aboard boats in Boot Key Harbor

###MON###
name: KEYS AREA INTERDENOMINATIONAL RESOURCES, INC.
